narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Socially Oriented United Living Inc. is a Respite Care provider based in Los Angeles, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $51.3M in Medicaid payments across 13K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $51.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
